coreAtributes.name: Heart Boxers
coreAtributes.description: A pair of boxers with hearts covering it.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull down your boxers and kick them off your feet.
displacementText.playerNPC: You pull down [npc.name]'s boxers and slide them off [npc.her] feet.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s boxers and roughly pull them down [npc.her] before lifting [npc.her] out of them.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls down [npc.her] boxers and kick them off [npc.her] feet.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] pulls down your boxers and slides them off your feet.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your boxers and roughly pulls them down, before lifting you out of them.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] pulls down [npc2.name]'s boxers and slides them off [npc2.her] feet.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s boxers and roughly pulls them down, before lifting [npc2.her] out of them.
